jobDescription: Ampcus Incs mantra for success is built around its 5 core values Honesty, Simplicity, Reliability, and Transparency & Customer Centricity. Bravens has expanded over the last few years and has successfully merged on-site project based staffing, executive search, direct hire placement and consulting. We are experts in providing Engineering and Information Technology Outsourcing & Services recruitment solutions. Bravens Inc is currently looking for Senior Business/Data Analyst based in McLean, VA 22102 for Contract to Position.  Position: Senior Business/Data Analyst  Locations: McLean, VA 22102  Duration: 06 months contract Responsibilities: Bachelors degree in Computer Science or Engineering or equivalent working experience.  A minimum of 7 to 10 years of experience in Senior Business/Data Analyst.  2-4 years of experience with DB2, Sybase and/or Oracle databases. Hands-on sql skills are a must.  Familiarity with Mortgage Industry and underlying loan data.  Experience with Unix/shell Scripting Language  The candidate should be able to work within a well-documented project methodology such as SDLC or Agile.  A detailed knowledge of fixed income securities and analytics, and experience with fixed income trading desks and modeling areas is a plus.  Warms Regards  Ampcus Inc
